comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Presumably en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleonora_Sears, a well known tennis player and horsewoman. "Eleonora Sears rode horses competitively and was elected to the US Show Jumping Hall of Fame in 1992. She also owned and raced Thoroughbred horses. She was the first woman to play polo on a men’s team."

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for the additional information on Sears.  We will include some of it next time we update.
